description:
Thoughts?  Despite #Americans growing weary with “quarantine fatigue”  and many being pressured to ease restrictions on factories, malls and state governments across the country, Dr. Anthony S. Fauci, is warning that a second wave of infections is “inevitable” in the #UnitedStates, which has reportedly recorded more than one million confirmed cases to date. 
Fauci went on to also warn that “we could be in for a bad fall and a bad winter” if the right countermeasures aren’t put in place.  Meanwhile, according to the Wall Street Journal, The federal government has recently ordered 100,000 more body bags, in what officials have described as preparations for a “worst-case” scenario. This recent order of body bags comes as more than 58,000 Americans have reportedly died from #Covid19, according to data from #JohnsHopkinsUniversity.
